text: Sol Raman boroghɨn Naiotɨn nguibamɨn otozɨ, Devit nguibar kam ategha arava, uamategha Jonatan bagha ghu. A kamaghɨn Jonatan mɨgei, “Ai Jonatan, nɨn afeziam tizim bagh na mɨsueghtɨ kɨ aremegham? Kɨ osɨmtɨzitam o arazir kuratamɨn a gamizir puvatɨ. Guizbangɨra, kɨ bizitamɨn osɨmtɨzitam itir puvatɨ.”
